Class Warlock

java.lang.Object
Entity
Enemy
EnemyDecorator
Warlock
All Implemented Interfaces:
Magical
public class Warlock
extends EnemyDecorator
implements Magical
Used to decorate an Enemy, increasing its max HP by 1 and giving it magical attacks Performs an additional attack after normal attack that is magical

  • Field Summary

    Fields inherited from interface Magical

    MAGIC_MENU

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    Warlock​(Enemy e)
    Calls super constructor giving the enemy passed in a new name and increased health

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    java.lang.String attack​(Entity e)
    Attacks the entity using the super's attack method then picks a random magic attack to use on the entity
    java.lang.String fireball​(Entity e)
    Magical attack type called Fireball that has deals to an entity a random amount of damage between 5 and 8, inclusive
    java.lang.String magicMissile​(Entity e)
    Magical attack type called Magic Missile that has deals to an entity a random amount of damage between 5 and 8, inclusive
    java.lang.String thunderClap​(Entity e)
    Magical attack type called Thunderclap that has deals to an entity a random amount of damage between 5 and 8, inclusive

    • attack

      public java.lang.String attack​(Entity e)
      Attacks the entity using the super's attack method then picks a random magic attack to use on the entity
      Overrides:
      attack in class Enemy
      Parameters:
      e - Entity to be attacked
      Returns:
      A string detailing the attacker, the type of attack, the entity being attacked and the damage dealt to said entity
